casebody.data:
No. 09-804. CIGNA Corporation, et al., Petitioners v. Janice C. Amara, et al., Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated. 559 U.S. 990, 130 S. Ct. 1754,

176 L. Ed. 2d 210,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2318. March 8, 2010.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
